overview: Ron Jeremy is getting married?!  Everybody seems to be invited; some random guy and his date. The disgruntled flower girl and the caterer.  A bad girl gone good and a psychotic axe murderer.  A professional go-go dancer (who is also a nymphomaniac) and her high school counselor.  The wife of the local drug czar, a wife of the local DEA agent and the man who is married to both.  And now the bride is late, what could go wrong?
title: One Big Orgy: The Wedding
